H0.text: islamic term for the community of the faithful. Jama'ah

H1.text: islamic term for the community of the faithful. Millah

H2.text: islamic term for the community of the faithful. Mujamma'

H3.text: islamic term for the community of the faithful. Ummah

A4.text: Ummah (; Arabic: أُمَّة [ˈʊm.mæ]) is an Arabic word meaning Muslim identity, nation, religious community, or the concept of a commonwealth of the Muslim believers (أمة المؤمنين ummat al-muʼminīn).
